description: Guidance on when DDD is a good or poor fit for Ruby projects.
applyTo: '**/*.rb, **/*.md'
---

# When to Use DDD (Ruby)

- **Good Fit:** Complex, evolving domains, domain expert collaboration, long-lived systems.
- **Poor Fit:** Simple CRUD, no domain experts, short-term prototypes.
